plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fantasy, as several of the books listed fall into that category. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be complex and multi-layered, as many of the books listed have intricate storylines with multiple subplots. The user's favourite setting is likely to be a fictional world, as many of the books listed are set in imaginary locations. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be descriptive and immersive, as many of the books listed are known for their richly-detailed prose. The user's favourite length is likely to be longer rather than shorter, as many of the books listed are doorstop-sized epics. The user's favourite topic is likely to be magic and mythology, as many of the books listed deal with these subjects. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be slow and methodical, as many of the books listed are known for their deliberate, meandering narratives. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be non-linear, as many of the books listed jump back and forth in time. The user's favourite themes are likely to be identity, power, and the nature of reality.
